title: Accidents
description: My dad, sister and I were all in a car driving at night. Someone t-bones us on the driver side. My dad, bleeding, wasn't responsive. I dragged him over to the passenger side and tool the wheel to make my way to the hospital. Someone how cares still work in you dreams.

title: Lucid Nightmare
description: I was sleep walking in this nightmare and couldnt wake up as an intruder came in through the window and started stabbing the wall. It was terrifying!
